extendedInfo.description: We know that managing a team that is always on the move is a real challenge. GeoPal Solutions for Mobile Workforce Management is a feature-rich, native (works offline) Android application for your field worker smartphones, working together with the GeoPal cloud service for office administrators, to provide a mobile workforce optimisation solution that increases field worker productivity while significantly reducing administration costs. The complete GeoPal Solution allows you to know where your workers are right now, what job they are working on, and what stage each job is at. With GeoPal cloud service you can schedule jobs and dispatch them to workers, with specific steps to be followed to complete the job. As each step is completed the worker confirms the step with the press of a button in the GeoPal mobile app, incorporating photos, signatures, barcode scans, GPS coordinates, or other media, and submits job reports and invoices directly from the field. GeoPal adds value by eliminating paperwork in the field and office, reducing costs and increasing efficiency and productivity for your whole business.Create your free 30 day trial account by going to www.geopalsolutions.com. This will give you access to the GeoPal cloud service for online job dispatch and scheduling, and a login which is required to use this app.GeoPal offers any company with field-based staff the ability to locate their staff, schedule and assign work, and capture data in the field.Specifically:â¢	View your teams on the map, track their movements and view their actions live;â¢	Assign work through Gantt Planners, MS Excel uploads, or API connections;â¢	Create your own workflows through a simple drag and drop interface â incorporating just 2-3 steps or many thousands â whatever meets your needs;â¢	Give your field workers detailed client information including addresses, contacts and phone numbers, and have them call and text from the app or get directions to the job using the map view. â¢	Capture Photos, Signatures, Barcodes, RFID tags, Text, Numbers, Lists, GPS points, and even make on-the-spot drawings.â¢	Use the GeoPal mobile app regardless of coverage in any environment;â¢	Review your data on the dashboard of the web application or filter it and export to excel, XML or PDF;â¢	Connect your current CRM, ERP, or Finance system to GeoPal through the API suite and pass data up and down live.GeoPal is a mobile workforce optimisation system built on the feedback of our customers. To discover what GeoPal can do for your business visit www.geopalsolutions.com

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Simple easy to navigate app, saves time and paper.
reviews.author: Tara Louise

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Reduced the time taken by our admin team by half
